price: Sana davacıların haberi geldi mi? Hani onlar duvarı aşarak mabede girmişlerdi.
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
